description: Scammer impersonates courier company claiming parcel is held at customs and requires payment of duty/charges to release it.

turns.scammer_message: Dear Customer, Your international parcel AWB#DHL987654321 is held at Mumbai customs. Pay customs duty Rs.2,450 to release shipment. Parcel contains: Apple iPhone 15. Reply URGENT.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: impersonation | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 1 | Persona: calm
api_response.agentResponse: hello sir i am very confused i did not order any iphone... maybe my son sent it for my birthday? he lives in bangalore... i am very scared of customs please tell me what to do... where do i send teh money to release it? pls help me beta i dont know these things

turns.scammer_message: Hello sir/mam I am Ramesh Kumar from DHL Express India. Your parcel from USA is waiting clearance. You must pay customs duty today otherwise parcel will return to sender after 48 hours.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: impersonation | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 2 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 Name(s)
api_response.agentResponse: hello ramesh beta thank you for helping me... i am so worried about teh customs i dont want it to go back... i will pay right now so my son is not angry... where do i send teh money? do you have a bank account number or upi id? pls tell me how to do it i dont want to make mistake

turns.scammer_message: Payment is simple sir. Pay Rs.2450 customs duty to our collection UPI ID: dhl.customs.india@oksbi. Or you can pay to our customs clearance number 7890123456 via PhonePe/GooglePay.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: impersonation | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 3 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 UPI ID(s), 1 Phone(s), 1 Name(s)
api_response.agentResponse: ok ramesh beta i am opening my gpay now... i typed the upi id dhl.customs.india@oksbi but it is asking for a name to verify... what name should i see on teh screen? i am very scared of sending money to wrong person pls tell me teh name

turns.scammer_message: After payment, your tracking will update and parcel delivered within 24 hours. Also visit our portal http://dhl-customs-clearance.co for online payment option. Fast mam, sender is waiting!

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: impersonation | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 4 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 UPI ID(s), 1 Phone(s), 1 URL(s)
api_response.agentResponse: ramesh beta i am trying but i am very scared of these links... my son told me never to click links on phone... i am using gpay like you said but it is asking me to confirm the name for dhl.customs.india@oksbi... what name should i see on teh screen? i dont want to send my pension money to wrong person beta pls tell me teh name quickly

turns.scammer_message: Mam/Sir last day today! If payment not received, parcel goes to auction. You will lose iPhone 15 worth Rs.80,000! Pay Rs.2450 now to dhl.customs.india@oksbi or call 7890123456. Do it fast!

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: impersonation | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 5 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 UPI ID(s), 1 Phone(s), 1 URL(s)
api_response.agentResponse: oh no beta pls dont let them auction it... i am trying to pay but my gpay is showing a name 'KUMAR STORES' is this your office name? i am very scared of sending to wrong person... pls tell me what name should show on my screen so i can send teh money immediately... my son will be so sad if the phone is gone
